document_data.author: [[Rick Swan]]
document_data.setting: Late {{YearlinkConvert|1776|WY}} or early {{YearlinkConvert|1777|WY}}<ref><ref group="note">The date of ''Test of the Samurai'' is unknown as page 5 only says "1770-: Current time." on the [[Wa Calendar]], which gives it a large range. The previous adventure, ''Ronin Challenge'', is also undated, but is limited by the events of ''[[Dragonwall (novel)|Dragonwall]]'' to late [[1358 DR]] or early [[1359 DR]]. Since ''Ronin'' connects directly to ''Samurai'', this must be similarly dated. In any case, the majority of Kara-Tur sources are set in 1357â€“1359 DR, so ''Test'' should be too.
